dict.string: $(PRODUCT_NAME) needs photo library permissions

This app needs access to Apple Music to help you find and play music.
This app requires Bluetooth to connect with nearby devices for enhanced functionality.
This app needs access to your calendar to help you schedule events.
This app needs access to your contacts for personalized messaging and sharing.
This app needs location access to provide location-based services and recommendations.
This app needs access to your location while in use to provide location-specific features.
This app needs microphone access for audio features and voice recording.
This app needs access to motion data to enhance user experience based on device movement.
This app needs access to your photo library to allow you to upload and share photos.
This app needs access to Siri for voice command integration.
This app needs access to speech recognition to enable voice commands.
